mapper.select: SELECT gatherno, title, place, views, nickname, DATE_FORMAT(startdate, "%Y-%m-%d") startdate, DATE_FORMAT(enddate, "%Y-%m-%d") enddate, DATE_FORMAT(createdate, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i") createdate, content, gmemberno, gnewno FROM gather ORDER BY gatherno DESC LIMIT ${param1.postsPerPage} OFFSET ${param1.offset}

UPDATE gather SET gnewno=gnewno+1 WHERE gatherno=#{param1}
